author: closer__
content:
<@360491619402776577> hey <a:hey:856236849349132288> , it's me again. i was skimming thru the spec and couldn't find anything on method deprecation, so I'll just ask here. the PR below deprecates fcuV1 post shanghai, but this behavior is not mirrored to newPayloadV1. could you elaborate a bit pls as to why this is the case?
PR: https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/26645
newPayloadV1 arg validation: https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/15e5e6176bb384514271c24e53c0b9e2f862b2a4/eth/catalyst/api.go#L412-L414
